sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' import $ from 'jquery' function CreateBoardModal (): JSX.Element { const [name, setName] = useState('') const [description, setDescription] = useState('') const sendRequest = (): void => { $.ajax({ url: 'http://localhost:8000/api/boards', type: 'POST', data: { name: name, description: description } }) } const onChangeName = (event: any) => { setName(event.target.value) } const onChangeDescription = (event: any) => { setDescription(event.target.value) } return
New Board
} export default CreateBoardModal
